backend/main.mo: Main actor for the MultiTiers app defining Player types (Tier, Category), CRUD operations for players (add, remove, update, search, filter), and user profile management, all gated by role-based access control (admin vs. user).
backend/migration.mo: Data migration module that upgrades the actor state from the old Player schema (without avatarUrl) to the new schema (with avatarUrl defaulting to null).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three implemented features—Minecraft avatar auto-fetch in admin form, per-player remove buttons in admin panel, and avatar display in PlayerCard—to their relevant files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles and notable changes such as avatar preview, remove player functionality, and UI polish.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, including color tokens for backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app, setting the page title to 'MultiTiers' and mounting the app at the #root div via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with four routes (Home, Tier List, Leaderboard, Admin), wraps the app in QueryClientProvider and SearchProvider, and renders the shared Navbar/Footer layout.
frontend/src/components/AdminModal.tsx: Password-gated modal component for admin actions, containing an Add Player form with all tier/category options and a scrollable player list, without delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: Button-group component for filtering players by category, with active state styling (scale, glow) and hover effects for inactive options.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a site footer with the MultiTiers branding, copyright year, and a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, desktop/mobile nav links (Home, Tier List, Leaderboard), and a search input that calls an `onSearchChange` callback.
frontend/src/components/PlayerCard.tsx: Displays a single player's avatar, name, score, and tier badge as a styled card, with tier-specific colors defined in the exported `TIER_CONFIG` map.
frontend/src/components/TierRow.tsx: Renders a horizontal tier row with a colored tier label on the left and a grid of `PlayerCard` components (or an empty-state message) on the right.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook for managing Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via `AuthClient`.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching players (all, by category, by tier, by search) and mutations for adding and removing players via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for the dark-mode color palette including ten tier-specific colors.
frontend/src/lib/SearchContext.tsx: Provides a simple React context (`SearchProvider` / `useSearch`) for sharing a global search term string across the component tree.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin management page with a password gate and UI for adding/removing players with tier and category selection.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing a hero section, tier breakdown stats, and top players with navigation to the tier list and leaderboard.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Leaderboard page that displays all players sorted by score with category filtering and search support.
frontend/src/pages/TierListPage.tsx: Tier list page that groups players by tier (HT1–LT5) with category filtering and search support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting both query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom fonts (Barlow Condensed, Inter), OKLCH-based semantic color tokens (app, sidebar, tier palette), dark mode support, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for a Minecraft Tier List app, tracking existing features (skin avatar fetching, player removal, avatar display) and pending feature requests (backend avatar URL storage, admin panel CRUD, public tier list display).
